snippet: A transgender couple who have been protesting the University of Pittsburgh's transgender policy have been told they are "persons of interest" in the investigation of bomb threats at the university's main campus since mid-February.
abstract: A transgender couple who have been protesting the University of Pittsburgh's transgender policy have been told they are "persons of interest" in the investigation of bomb threats at the university's main campus since mid-February.

headline.main: Couple Questioned About Bomb Threats at University of Pittsburgh
